Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

::Chaostaur::
       Having regained his wits he looks over at his "rescuers."  He's a bit 
shaken at his gun not firing but shrugs it off as a simple malfunction.  "I 
serve no one.  I live only to kill.  If you point me at a target then I will 
kill them.  If you don't then I will kill you.  As long as you understand 
that, we'll get along fine."

       He gets off the bed and raises himself to his full height.  He glares 
down at Bamphomet, hoping that his size and multitude of weaponry would be 
enough to intimidate his rescuer.

--part1_5a.5e6c3c1.298cb26f_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

<BR>
<BR>       He gets off the bed and raises himself to his full height.  He glares down at Bamphomet, hoping that his size and multitude of weaponry would be enough to intimidate his rescuer.</FONT></HTML>
